mapper.select: select b.*, f.fu_storedname from banner b inner join fileupload f on f.fu_no = b.fu_no order by b_no
select s.* , (select fu_storedname from fileupload f where f.fu_no = s.fu_no) fu_storedname from styling s order by s_date

select * from ( select p.p_no, p.p_name, f.fu_no, f.fu_storedname, f.fu_date, ( select count(*) from productlike l where p.p_no=l.p_no ) like_cnt from product p inner join fileupload f on p.fu_no = f.fu_no) prod where like_cnt >= 5
select f.*, (select faqct_name from faqcategory fa where f.faqct_no = fa.faqct_no) faqct_name from faq f where faq_name like '%' || #{word} || '%' order by faq_no desc
select f.*, (select faqct_name from faqcategory fa where f.faqct_no = fa.faqct_no) faqct_name from faq f where faq_no = #{faq_no }
select count(*) from (select f.*, (select faqct_name from faqcategory fa where f.faqct_no = fa.faqct_no) faqct_name from faq f where faq_name like '%' || #{word} || '%')
